ModMetaData.name: Ore Yields (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Neceros
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img] Update of Neceros mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2036872981 whith their approval
- Rewrote the mod to use Harmony postfixes instead, hopefully it will not cause any errors with other mods
[img]https://i.imgur.com/7Gzt3Rg.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/OreYields][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NOW7jU1.png[/img] [h1]NO LONGER WORKS IN 1.2 - Someone is welcome to fix it.[/h1]
Set how much material drops when you mine it from the world (in the mod settings menu.) Works for silver, gold, steel, plasteel, uranium, jade, and components.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/L7o1pvX.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/ldroDjl.png[/img]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/Rs6T6cr.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
